title: Name suggestion
body: looking for a new creative name as i am having a mental block and i find my name to be "edgy" at the moment fellow summoners i beg you to help me

replies.body: We would need to know a bit more info. What kind of theme are you looking at? What are some things you like (i.e. Anime, Sports, something other than LoL)? Are you a one-/two- trick? Do you only play one lane? Do you tend to play something way off meta? etc.?
What's your name in real life? that's always a decent fallback plan
